title: Levi's Men's 501 Original Fit Jeans
description: The Levi's Men's 501 Original Fit Jeans in Blue are the epitome of classic American denim. Made from high-quality 100% cotton denim, these jeans offer a timeless look with a straight-leg cut and a regular fit that is comfortable for all-day wear. The traditional button fly, five-pocket design, and signature red tab on the back pocket make these jeans a staple in any wardrobe. Perfect for both casual and semi-formal occasions, these jeans can be paired with a variety of outfits.
key_features: Iconic Levi's red tab on the back pocket
meta_title: Levi's Men's 501 Original Fit Jeans - Blue - Size 32
meta_description: Shop Levi's Men's 501 Original Fit Jeans in Blue. Classic straight-leg cut with a regular fit, made from durable 100% cotton denim. Ideal for casual and semi-formal wear. Available in Size 32.
